name: AUPrimaryCareAllergyIntoleranceList
title: AU Primary Care Allergy Intolerance List
description: This profile defines an allergy intolerance list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
purpose: This profile defines an allergy intolerance list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.

element.short: A list of allergies/intolerances in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
element.definition: A list of substances which, on administration or during exposure, may put the individual at risk of an adverse reaction.
element.comment:
Absence: A positive statement of absence of any adverse reaction information will be represented by the phrase 
Exclusion: A positive statement excluding the presence of any adverse reactions will be represented  by the phrase ‘Nil known’.
